mapper.sql: id, user_id, withdrawal_no, money_comm, money_balance, money_num, money_tax, tax_ratio, account, name, way, status, remark, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select w.id, w.user_id, w.withdrawal_no, w.money_comm, w.money_balance, w.money_num, w.money_tax, w.tax_ratio, w.account, w.name, w.way, w.status, w.remark, w.create_time, w.update_time,u.email from t_finance_withdrawal as w left join t_user_info as u on u.user_id = w.user_id where 1 = 1
and u.account like '%${account}%'
and w.status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by w.id desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_finance_withdrawal (user_id, withdrawal_no, money_comm, money_balance, money_num, money_tax, tax_ratio, account, name, way, status, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moneyComm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taxRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{way,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_finance_withdrawal
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
withdrawal_no = #{withdrawalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money_comm = #{moneyComm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_balance = #{moneyBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_num = #{moneyNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_tax = #{moneyTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
tax_ratio = #{taxRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
way = #{way,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_finance_withdrawal set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, withdrawal_no = #{withdrawalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money_comm = #{moneyComm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_balance = #{moneyBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_num = #{moneyNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_tax = #{moneyTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tax_ratio = #{taxRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, way = #{way,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
